News.Title: Equippp Social Impact Incorporates New Unit
News.Summary: Equippp Social Impact Technologies has incorporated a new subsidiary unit named P4 Goods And Services Pvt Ltd, marking a strategic expansion of its business operations.

News.Title: EQUIPPP Social Impact Technologies: Partners with Skills University for Free BFSI Training
News.Summary: EQUIPPP signed an MoU with Young India Skills University to launch a free BFSI Skill Development Program in Telangana, aiming to train 10,000 students annually for three years. The program will use EQUIPPP's Skill Portal for tracking outcomes and job placements. EQUIPPP's shares were down 2.47% on the NSE.
